channel.title: CVE Feed for phpMussel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for phpMussel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-4043|2024-08-04T07:52:20.782Z -- phpmussel -- phpmussel
item.description: phpMussel from versions 1.0.0 and less than 1.6.0 has an unserialization vulnerability in PHP's phar wrapper. Uploading a specially crafted file to an affected version allows arbitrary code execution (discovered, tested, and confirmed by myself), so the risk factor should be regarded as very high. Newer phpMussel versions don't use PHP's phar wrapper, and are therefore unaffected. This has been fixed in version 1.6.0.
